Layout/ArrayAlignment.description:
Description

Align the elements of an array literal if they span more than one line.
Layout/ArrayAlignment.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: with_first_element (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['with_first_element', 'with_fixed_indentation'] (type: list)
IndentationWidth: None (type: NoneType)
